content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 47, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 31}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "melon_seeds", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 51, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft a crimson_pressure_plate, I need to craft a crimson_planks first. To craft a crimson_planks, I need to place 1 crimson_stem in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the crimson_stem from slot 18 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 47, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 31}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "melon_seeds", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 51, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that the crimson_planks have been crafted, I can move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 47, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 31}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "melon_seeds", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 51, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a crimson_pressure_plate, I need to place 1 crimson_planks in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the crimson_planks from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 47, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 31}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "melon_seeds", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 51, "index": 39}]

thought: Now that the crimson_planks have been moved into the crafting grid, I can craft the crimson_pressure_plate. To do this, I need to move another crimson_planks to the right of the one already in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the crimson_planks from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 47, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 31}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "melon_seeds", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 51, "index": 39}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
